raw_body: Rev. Fr. NALIN SURAJA of the Archdiocese of Colombo,​ expired on Monday,​ the 30th October 2023. He was the beloved son of H.D. Edwin Joseph and W.D. Irangani Mallika. His remains will lie in state at St. Anthony’s Church,​ Kongodamulla,​ on Wednesday,​ 1st November from 10 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. and thereafter transferred to Our Lady of Good Voyage Church,​ Duwa. On Thursday,​ 2nd November at 7.00 p.m. his remains will be taken to St. Joseph’s Church,​ Pamunugama. The Requiem Mass will be held on Friday,​ the 3rd November at 9.30 a.m. followed by burial at the Church Cemetery at Pamunugama.070000
